title: New York State Hires Monitor for City’s Foster Care System
locations: New York State Hires Monitor for City
text:
Published By: NYTimes NY Region - Yesterday 
The state will hire a monitor and a research expert to oversee the New York City system, which a lawsuit claimed irreparably harmed children...
